source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with a modern house visible on a cliff to the right. The only movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with a modern house visible on a cliff to the right. The only movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.

generated_critique: The caption is overly descriptive of the static elements in the scene and uses the subjective adjective "scenic." The instruction for scenery shots is to "briefly note this in one to three sentences." The current caption uses two sentences to describe the static landscape ("scenic, static shot," "hazy day," "large, green-topped sea stack," "turquoise ocean," "modern house") before describing the motion in a third sentence. This should be condensed into a more concise statement that integrates the environmental motion, such as describing how the ocean waves crash against the sea stack and cliffs while grass sways in the foreground.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: In this static shot of a hazy coastal landscape, turquoise waves crash against a large, green-topped sea stack and a rocky cliff where a modern house sits, as out-of-focus grass sways in the foreground.
